summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure a smooth user experience. (Recommendation: Review server logs, network requests, and page resources to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.)

issues.message: The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is essential to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure a smooth user experience. (Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Review server logs, network requests, and page resources to identify bottlenecks and optimize performance.)

issues.message: The homepage has a load time of 563ms, which is within an acceptable range. However, there is still room for improvement. (Recommendation
issues.recommendation: Continue optimizing images, minifying CSS and JavaScript, and leveraging browser caching.)

insights: The pricing page and blog page have the fastest load times, indicating that their optimization strategies are effective.
The time to first byte (TTFB) is relatively low across all pages, suggesting that the server response time is good.
Further investigation is required to understand why the "How It Works" page failed the test and to implement necessary optimizations.
